name: Scramble All Fighters
description:
Amazing graphics. Countless different units. An addictive Battle Pass. We have none of those things, but we are very, very cheap!

Take command of a lone Carrier as you attempt to cross the solar system in a retro arcade swarm shooter set among the planets and moons of our own corner of space. With a minimalist design aesthetic like it was a refugee from the 90s, Scramble All Fighters! takes seconds to learn, but will only yield ultimate victory to someone willing to master its deceptively simple tactical, strategic, and logistical challenges.

Victory is not enough... you may win the battle, but still lose the war!

  • Tiny fighters, big battles! It's flocking brilliant
  • Minimalist game design and effortless two-button controls
  • Challenging sectors where victory requires winning up to nine consecutive battles
  • Rewind time when a key battle goes wrong - spend your Timewarps with care!
  • Kids mode for anyone looking for a less demanding campaign
